Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Reroute at Balbo/Michigan
ShortDescription: 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore Drive, Roosevelt, and Michigan due to, street blockage near Balbo/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Lake Shore Drive, Roosevelt, and Michigan due to, street blockage near Balbo/Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Reroute at Hyde Park/54th
ShortDescription: 55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via Garfield, Lake Park, 53rd, and Hyde Park due to, street blockage near Hyde Park/54th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Garfield, Lake Park, 53rd, and Hyde Park due to, street blockage near Hyde Park/54th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #63 63rd (Beach) Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 63rd/Stony Island
ShortDescription: EB 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Stony Island, Marquette, Richards, Hayes, 67th & Stony Island due to street blockage near 63rd/Stony Island.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #63 63rd (Beach) buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Stony Island, Marquette, Richards, Hayes, 67th and Stony Island due to street blockage near 63rd/Stony Island.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Diversey. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Diversey.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
